content:
You can post feature request in the following forum: https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android

There are the same feature requests in the above forum already, and you can upvote them: 1. Thunderbird Android - contact lists https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/thunderbird-android-contact-lists/idi-p/74643 2. filtering with Android Thunderbird https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/filtering-with-android-thunderbird/idi-p/61144
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
